error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.message: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened. Please try refreshing the page.

notFoundPage.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFoundPage.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

seo.defaultDescription: Master mathematics with interactive lessons, practice problems, and personalized learning paths. Learn math at your own pace with our comprehensive educational platform.
seo.defaultKeywords: math learning, mathematics education, interactive lessons, math practice, educational app, learning platform, math skills

lessons.title: Math Lessons - Interactive Learning
lessons.description: Explore our comprehensive collection of interactive math lessons. From beginner to advanced topics, master mathematics with hands-on practice and detailed explanations.
lessons.keywords: math lessons, interactive learning, mathematics tutorial, math education, practice problems

profile.title: Your Learning Profile - Progress & Achievements
profile.description: Track your math learning progress, view achievements, and monitor your skill development. See detailed statistics about your learning journey.
profile.keywords: learning progress, math achievements, student profile, learning analytics, math skills tracking

results.title: Learning Results & Achievements
results.description: View your completed lessons, quiz results, and learning achievements. Celebrate your progress and see how far you've come in your math journey.
results.keywords: math results, learning achievements, quiz scores, progress tracking, math accomplishments
